visualizations.title: Residuals Over Time

insights: - Residuals centered around zero with no significant outliers
- Forecast trend shows strong alignment with historical patterns
data.summary: The forecasting model successfully predicted annual food crop area utilization for 2024-25 with high accuracy (R2=0.9997, MAE=2.33). Visualizations confirm predictions align closely with historical trends and actual values.
data.task_answer: The forecasting model successfully predicted annual food crop area utilization for 2024-25 with high accuracy (R2=0.9997, MAE=2.33). Visualizations confirm predictions align closely with historical trends and actual values.
